**Major League Cricket (MLC) Details:**

* The inaugural season of MLC will take place in July, featuring six teams playing over three weeks in Texas and North Carolina.
* The teams are based in New York, Dallas, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Seattle, and Washington DC, with a $1.5 million salary cap each season.
* The league has received investments from Indian heavyweights, including Microsoft boss Satya Nardella and Bollywood legend Shah Rukh Khan, totaling AU$174 million.

* Smith has a connection to New York and has hinted at finishing his cricket career in America.

* The stadium plans include state-of-the-art training facilities, locker rooms, luxury suites, and an international-grade pitch to meet International Cricket Council (ICC) accreditation.
